name: Prism(LD49)
description:
A golden cruiser on the run from enemies in the prism nebula gets into trouble when its reactor becomes unstable. try to escape from encroaching enemies without overheating the reactor. control throttle and coolant in order to keep reactor temperatures in check while simultaneously syncing the shield to light Turbulence. You must also dodge asteroids using excess temperature buildup. Can you get to the exit before capture. 

over scoped this one a alot didn't end up getting it where I wanted o h w e l l 

Art & Code: Gat

Music & Sounds: Mickalo - https://soundcloud.com/just_van

Change Log 

1.0 - initial release

1.1 - fixed issue with no asteroids spawning if the  first one was missed
